m=matrix(rep(0,25*25),nrow=25)
for (i in 1:dim(m)[1]){
  for (j in 1:dim(m)[2]){
    if (((i-13)^2 + (j-13)^2) < 10^2){
      m[i,j]<- 1
    }
  }
}
image(m, useRaster=TRUE, axes=FALSE)

c(rep(c(1,2), each=5),178,175,182,193,171,159,167,173,153,160) ->m
height<- matrix(m,10, ncol=2)
height3 <- data.frame(height = height[,2], gender = factor(height[,1]))
height.aov <- aov(height~gender, data=height3)
summary(height.aov)
hx<- data.frame(v=c(1,3,4,5,6,4,4,6,3,2,4,2,6,2,6,3,4,5,2,6,2),h=rep(c(1,2,3),each=7))
hx
hx.aov<- aov(v~h,data=hx)
summary(hx.aov)
boxplot(v~h,data = hx)
hist(log(hx[,1]),xlab="height",main="Histogram")
qqnorm(log(hx[,1]))
